timestamp.description: Canonical genesis moment - pre-committed before any entropy values known

bitcoin_anchor.description: First Bitcoin block mined at or after 2026-01-15T00:00:00Z
bitcoin_anchor.note: Block hash UNKNOWN at pre-commit time - will be determined by Bitcoin network

nist_beacon.description: First NIST Randomness Beacon pulse at or after 2026-01-15T00:00:00Z
nist_beacon.note: Pulse output UNKNOWN at pre-commit time - will be determined by NIST service

operator_commitment.description: SHA3-256 hash of 256-bit cryptographically secure operator seed
operator_commitment.note: Seed generated BEFORE Bitcoin block or NIST pulse values known - proves no manipulation
operator_commitment.commitment_verified: SHA3-256 computed using Rust sha3 crate v0.10 (FIPS 202 compliant)

procedural_guarantees.no_discretion: All entropy sources determined by external systems (Bitcoin network, NIST) or pre-committed values (operator seed)
procedural_guarantees.no_cherry_picking: Operator seed committed before block/pulse values exist
procedural_guarantees.no_retries: Genesis executes exactly once with materialized entropy
procedural_guarantees.offline_verifiable: Anyone can verify: (1) commitment hash matches revealed seed, (2) Bitcoin block matches rule, (3) NIST pulse matches rule, (4) genesis hash derived correctly
procedural_guarantees.immutable_timeline: Timestamp locked at pre-commit - cannot be changed to seek favorable entropy

ed25519.description: Canonical signing key for genesis attestation

publication.purpose: Public commitment to entropy rules and operator seed hash - proves no post-hoc manipulation

at_ceremony: Fetch Bitcoin block hash for first block ≥ timestamp
Fetch NIST pulse output for first pulse ≥ timestamp
Publish: attestation, manifest, registry, certificates, entropy_bundle
by_anyone: Verify Bitcoin block satisfies rule (first block ≥ timestamp)
Verify NIST pulse satisfies rule (first pulse ≥ timestamp)
Recompute genesis hash from published entropy_bundle
Verify attestation signature with published Ed25519 public key

attestation.statement: This pre-commitment record locks the Y3K canonical genesis ceremony to 2026-01-15T00:00:00Z with entropy derived from Bitcoin block, NIST Beacon pulse, and pre-committed operator seed. No discretion remains after this publication. Genesis can be verified by anyone, replicated by no one.
